issue.title: Intern empty `Depset`s

labels.name: team-Rules-API
labels.description: API for writing rules/aspects: providers, runfiles, actions, artifacts

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Empty `Depset`s are interned per order, which decreases allocations as well as retained heap when a `Depset` is stored in a `struct` in a provider (providers with schema already unwrap most `Depset`s). 

Fixes #19380

issue.title: perf: share single empty depset when using js_info factory

repository.name: rules_js
repository.description: High-performance Bazel rules for running Node.js tools and building JavaScript projects

issue.body:
Avoid constructing empty depsets in this common factory method case.

---

### Changes are visible to end-users: no
